title: Bulletin
title-note: Nevada Bureau of Mines and Geology
aka: Nevada Bureau of Mines and Geology Bulletin

preceded-by.note: Geology and Mining Series (University of Nevada)

additional-note: This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
